name: Desk Lamp TL1B-E27 with Tap Switch On-Off | Industrial Design - Steampunk
description:
Product description:
This hanging bulb table lamp evokes an eerie air—Jack the Ripper, deerstalkers and shadows cast by street lamps across foggy London. But you needn’t worry about the gas in these lamps running out—they come with a unique tap switch, bringing period details into the present. 

Our lamps are handmade, using industrial materials, tap switches and fabric cable, making our lamps unique and a delight for the connoisseur of bespoke interior creations.

Tastefully incorporating a variety of industrial materials, these stunning lights blend beautifully with all living styles, but spark a particular affinity with urban, industrial and retro tastes.

Each lamp is made in compliance with British and European Union Standards.

Designed and handcrafted in the UK by Pete Karolewski.

Base: Copper + Brass 
Switch on/off: Stop cock (Tap) 
Cable: 2m fabric cable, the colour red is standard - cable colour and length can be customised, simply look at the range of colours and email us (+£5.00 per meter) 
Feet padded with felt

Weight: 1.3kg 
Width: 180mm
Length: 180mm
Height: 320mm
Input: 240v 
Light bulb: E27, 60w max 
Bulb: Not included

UK delivery: free, 5 working days 
Outside the UK: free, 10-14 working days 
Customised orders: + 5 working days
